title: Long-Maturity Treasuries Fall After Market’s Best Year in Five
description: Long-maturity Treasuries began 2026 on the defensive following the market’s biggest annual gain in five years, as investors focused on the potential for additional Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts to stoke inflation.
content: Long-maturity Treasuries began 2026 on the defensive following the market’s biggest annual gain in five years, as investors focused on the potential for additional Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts to stoke inflation.
